entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13 except plus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. High 13 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
